title: Love Drug
sinopse:
Collection of 6 oneshots:

1. Leave Me Alone With First Love!
   Love triangle between a teacher, his student/cousin, and the cousin's best friend.

2. Reward of a Smile
   Two highschool students set up an arrangement for paid rendevous, but the motivation for one isn't just sexual.
   (Also published in Gorgeous Heart)

3. Love Rhapsody
   A photographer works on "intensity" with his new model.
   (Also published in Gorgeous Heart)

4. Knight Gold
   Sumiyoshi's got a problem keeping it up... so his partner tries to spice things up with a threesome.
   (Also published in Gorgeous Heart)

(from M-U)
